availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Russell County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa C. Collins Selby. Father of James M. Selby, Samuel C. Selby, Theresa Selby, and Eliza Selby.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell County, Russell District, p. 10; Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Russell County, 1850; Find A Grave, "Green Berry Selby 1829-1902)," Memorial #85128060, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=85128060] (accessed May 25, 2017).
